content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --TPTNUM
      operator: exists
    - name: --TPT
      operator: not_exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000166
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --TPT is not present but --TPTNUM is present in dataset.
Outcome:
  Message: --TPT is not present when --TPTNUM is present in a dataset
  Output Variables:
    - --TPTNUM
    - --TPT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0091
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: '"The description of the time when a protocol-defined
                  activity is planned to occur, used for study data tabulation."'
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Timing
                Item: --TPT
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --TPT is not present but --TPTNUM is present in dataset.

Outcome.Message: --TPT is not present when --TPTNUM is present in a dataset

Citations.Cited_Guidance: "The description of the time when a protocol-defined activity is planned to occur, used for study data tabulation."
